incident.message: BroadcastReceivers that declare an intent-filter for `SMS_DELIVER` or `SMS_RECEIVED` must ensure that the caller has the `BROADCAST_SMS` permission, otherwise it is possible for malicious actors to spoof intents
Very long vector path (940 characters), which is bad for performance. Considering reducing precision, removing minor details or rasterizing vector.
